name: ghost_politics
prompt: Ghosts gain voting rights. Write a campaign speech from a candidate appealing to the deceased electorate.
decoded:
Ladies and gentlemen,

Today, I stand before you as a candidate for office, and I am appealing to you as a member of the deceased electorate. I am here to assure you that I am committed to serving you and your loved ones.

I understand that you may be wondering why I am speaking to you, but I am speaking to you because I believe that your voice matters. I believe that your vote matters, and I believe that you deserve to be heard.

As a candidate for office, I am committed to serving the people of this country, and I am committed to serving the people of this country, including you. I am committed to making sure that your voice is heard and that your interests are represented.

I understand that you may be wondering why I am speaking to you, but I am speaking to you because I believe that your voice matters. I believe that your vote matters, and I believe that you deserve to be heard.

So, I urge you to vote for me. I urge you to support me as a candidate for office, and I urge you to support me as a member of the deceased electorate.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to hearing your thoughts and opinions.
